FINAMEXO.MX.short_name: CASA DE BOLSA FINAMEX SAB DE CV
FINAMEXO.MX.long_name: Casa de Bolsa Finamex S.A.B. de C.V.
FINAMEXO.MX.summary: Casa de Bolsa Finamex S.A.B. de C.V. operates as a provider of access services to the Mexican markets. The company offers financial services to individual, corporate, or professional investors in the Mexican markets of money, capital, derivatives, and exchange with various direct access products and specialized mixtures. It also provides securities purchase/sale, equity market brokerage, and foreign currency purchase and sale services. The company was founded in 1974 and is based in Guadalajara, Mexico.

GBMO.MX.summary: Corporativo GBM, S.A.B. de C.V. provides financial products and services to large corporations and mid-cap companies, institutional investors, and Mexican and foreign individuals. The company offers investment banking services, including capital and debt market, mergers and acquisitions, and corporate restructuring services; and financial intermediation services, such as capital market promotion, international sales and trading, e-trading, investment advisory, derivatives capital, and money market services, as well as digital platform, which has access to its clients to purchase and sale stock and investment funds. It also provides investment administration products comprising investment funds, flexible credit, and asset management services, as well as institutional investment, trust, and private banking services. The company was formerly known as GBM GRUPO BURSATIL MEXICANO, S.A.B. de C.V. and changed its name to Corporativo GBM, S.A.B. de C.V. in 2007. Corporativo GBM, S.A.B. de C.V. was founded in 1978 and is based in Mexico City, Mexico.

INVEXA.MX.summary: INVEX Controladora, S.A.B. de C.V provides financial products and services to individual and business customers. The company offers money market and capital market products, investment funds, structured products, and personal retirement plans; foreign exchange services; financing services; trust services; and cards. It also provides factoring facilities; currencies and derivatives; leasing services; institutional investments; treasury management products; and corporate cards. The company is based in Mexico City, Mexico.

MONEXB.MX.summary: Monex, S.A.B. de C.V., together with its subsidiaries, provides various financial services to individuals and companies in Mexico, the United States, Canada, Europe, the United Kingdom, Spain, Holland, and Singapore. The company's products and services include currency exchange and payments, corporate and commercial credits, letters of credit, short-term credit facilities, multicurrency digital accounts, investment funds, trusts, derivatives and structured notes, financial advisory, securities investment, international investments, as well as electronic exchange platforms and insurance products. It also provides foreign exchange trading, cash management, business credits, stock brokerage, private advice, digital account, certificates of term deposit, promissory notes with maturity- liquidable yield, and risk management products and services comprises options, institutional savings and personal retirement plans, forwards, swaps, and futures; and leasing products for transport-related assets, and machinery and equipment. In addition, the company is involved in the individualization of funds and savings banks; analysis and issuance of investment recommendations, promotion or trade of securities, money transfer transactions; currency buying/selling, and management of securities portfolios; and mobile and electronic banking services. It operates a network of 40 branches in Mexico. The company was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Mexico City, Mexico.

PROCORPB.MX.summary: Procorp, S.A.B. de C.V. is a private equity and venture capital firm specializing in Middle market, early venture, buyout acquisitions and growth capital investments. The firm seeks to invest in small and medium size Mexican-based companies with annual sales between $20 million and $150 million within the education, health, housing, infrastructure, energy, logistics, and financial and municipal services sectors. It considers both minority and majority stakes and usually exits its investments through an IPO. Procorp, S.A. de C.V. was founded in 1986 and is based in Mexico City, Mexico.

VALUEGFO.MX.short_name: VALUE GRUPO FINANCIERO SAB DE C
VALUEGFO.MX.long_name: Value Grupo Financiero, S.A.B. de C.V.
VALUEGFO.MX.summary: Value Grupo Financiero, S.A.B. de C.V. provides various financial services. It provides stock exchange, credit, operational and financial leasing, and factoring services. The company was formerly known as Grupo Financiero Fina Value SA de CV and changed its name to Value Grupo Financiero, S.A.B. de C.V. in May 2000. Value Grupo Financiero, S.A.B. de C.V. was founded in 1992 and is based in San Pedro Garza GarcÃ­a, Mexico.
